discovery.text: The CIA secretly arranged its publication in Italian in 1957, then distributed Russian copies behind the Iron Curtain.

twist.text: Pasternak won the 1958 Nobel Prize but was forced by the Soviet government to decline it under threat.

punchline.text: A spy agency weaponized a love story. And the story won.
